item.title: 美联储的 "更长更高的耶稣受难日
item.description:
鲍威尔明确表示他不急于降息，市场相信他的话，在经济如此强劲的情况下，这并不是坏事

。【原文：

Powell makes it clear he’s in no rush to cut rates, markets believe him, and that’s not bad with an economy this strong

】

item.title: 香港购物中心运营商利福寻求高达 10 亿美元的贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港购物中心运营商利福国际控股有限公司（Lifestyle International Holdings Ltd.）正在与银行洽谈贷款再融资事宜。【原文：Hong Kong mall operator Lifestyle International Holdings Ltd. is in talks with banks to refinance a loan that backs a landmark retail project at a mega development covering the city’s former airport, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 戛纳游艇邂逅引发日内瓦银行家涉嫌 18 亿美元 1MDB 诈骗案
item.description: 事情始于 2009 年夏天在戛纳海岸游艇上的一次会面。新当选的马来西亚总理应商人刘醇逸和沙特-瑞士商人塔里克-奥贝德的邀请登上了游艇。他们聚集在一起是为了探讨马来西亚新经济发展基金 1MDB 的交易。【原文：It began with a meeting on a yacht off the coast of Cannes in the summer of 2009. The newly-elected prime minister of Malaysia was aboard at the invitation of businessman Jho Low and Saudi-Swiss businessman Tarek Obaid. The men had gathered to explore deals for Malaysia’s new economic development fund, 1MDB.】

item.title: 印度广受欢迎的外汇衍生品市场因 RBI 规则而陷入混乱
item.description: 在印度央行加强了要求相关外汇风险敞口的规定后，印度的经纪商要求客户平仓与卢比挂钩的货币衍生品交易。【原文：India’s brokerages have asked clients to close out currency derivatives trades linked to the rupee after the central bank reinforced a rule requiring an underlying foreign-exchange exposure.】

item.title: 中国经济前景曙光初现，铜价上涨
item.description: 铜价升至一周多以来的最高水平，原因是投资者权衡了第一大消费国中国乐观的工厂数据以及该国主要冶炼厂减产的可能性。【原文：Copper advanced to the highest level in more than a week as investors weighed upbeat factory data from top consumer China and the potential for output cuts by the country’s leading smelters.】

item.title: 特朗普 1.75 亿美元债券由亿万富翁支持者的公司安排
item.description: 一位亿万富翁唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的支持者，其加利福尼亚公司以次级汽车贷款而闻名，在纽约州的民事欺诈诉讼案中，他主动提出为前总统安排 1.75 亿美元的上诉保证金，尽管他表示政治与此无关。【原文：A billionaire Donald Trump supporter whose California company is known for subprime auto loans offered to arrange the former president’s $175 million appeal bond in New York state’s civil fraud suit, though he said politics had nothing to do with it.】

item.title: 铁矿石跌至 100 美元预示中国经济新转向
item.description: 铁矿石重回每吨 100 美元左右的价位，表明中国大宗商品市场正在进行更广泛的重塑，新经济比旧经济更受青睐。【原文：Iron ore’s reset to around $100 a ton is indicative of a broader reshaping of China’s commodities markets that favors the new economy over the old.】

item.title: 取消房产限制后香港新房销售创 11 年新高
item.description: 3 月份，香港新房交易量创下 11 年新高，这对于政府取消降温措施后疲软的房地产市场来说是一个令人鼓舞的迹象。【原文：Hong Kong’s new home transactions hit an 11-year high in March, an encouraging sign for the beaten-down property market after the government lifted cooling measures.】

item.title: 中国石油击败工商银行，成为第二大岸股
item.description: 中国石油巨头中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.【原文：Chinese oil giant PetroChina Co.’s market value has surpassed that of the nation’s top lender, making it the second-largest listed company in mainland China.】

item.title: 卢比因债券外流和美元走强跌至四年低点
item.description: 印尼盾兑美元汇率跌至四年来的最低点，原因是对即将上任的政府承诺增加支出感到担忧，外国基金继续抛售当地债券。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah fell to a four-year low against the dollar as foreign funds continue to sell local bonds amid worries over the incoming administration’s pledges to boost spending.】

item.title: 压力增大，中国万科首次获得香港卖出评级
item.description: 在香港上市的中国万科股份有限公司首次获得华尔街券商的卖出评级，该开发商正努力应对日益加深的流动性压力和利润下滑。【原文：Hong Kong-listed shares of China Vanke Co. got their first sell rating from Wall Street brokerages, as the developer grapples with deepening liquidity pressure and slumping profits.】

item.title: 经济乐观情绪升温，中国股市在香港大涨
item.description: 随着交易员结束两个交易日的休市返回香港，香港中资股上涨，追随周一因经济复苏新迹象而上涨的在岸股市。【原文：Chinese shares in Hong Kong rose as traders returned from a two-session break, tracking Monday’s gains in onshore stocks on fresh signs of an economic recovery.】

item.title: PAG 以超过 4 亿美元的价格从 Hines 收购日本仓库
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于香港的另类资产管理公司 PAG 已从房地产开发商 Hines 手中购买了日本中部的一个物流中心。【原文：PAG, the Hong Kong-based alternative asset manager, has purchased a logistics center in central Japan from real estate developer Hines, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通押注斯里兰卡红火的债务市场
item.description: 由于对重组协议持乐观态度，全球资金经理们纷纷转向斯里兰卡的本币政府债券，作为该国红火的债务市场的追赶交易。【原文：Global money managers are turning to Sri Lanka’s local-currency government bonds as a catch-up trade in the country’s red hot debt market on optimism for a restructuring deal.】

item.title: 策略师称日本干预将导致五日元反弹
item.description: 据日本一些最大经纪商的策略师称，如果日本当局决定干预外汇市场，其目标可能是让日元兑美元汇率反弹 5 日元。【原文：Japanese authorities would probably target a five-yen rally against the dollar if they decide to intervene in foreign exchange markets, according to strategists at some of the country’s biggest brokerages.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国国债全线下跌。美联储 6 月降息几率降至 50%以下。日元兑美元汇率跌至152。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US Treasuries fell across the curve. Fed rate-cut odds for June dipped below 50%. The yen weakened toward 152 per dollar. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 投资者正在平仓 "买印度卖中国 "的股票交易
item.description: 对一些投资者来说，"买入印度，卖出中国 "这一流行的股票策略已经到了一个拐点。【原文：A popular equities strategy to “buy India, sell China” has reached an inflection point for some investors.】

item.title: 因中东风险和墨西哥供应削减，石油接近五个月高点
item.description: 由于中东地缘政治风险加剧以及墨西哥供应收紧，石油价格维持在五个月高位附近。【原文：Oil held near a five-month high with heightened geopolitical risks in the Middle East and tighter supply from Mexico helping to buoy prices.】

item.title: 挑选中国股票赢家的 Pimco 量化基金转向科技领域
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：A Pacific Investment Management Co.’s quantitative fund that delivered returns despite China’s slumping stock market is turning to beaten-down tech giants.】

item.title: 美国数据强劲，债券和股票承压：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市走低、国债遭到大量抛售之后，亚洲股市谨慎开盘，因为可靠的美国工厂数据强化了美联储不会急于降息的猜测。【原文：Asian equities were poised for a cautious open after US stocks edged lower and Treasuries sold heavily as solid US factory data reinforced speculation that the Federal Reserve will be in no rush to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 美国希望查封与前刚果领导人有关的纽约市豪华公寓
item.description: 根据周一在纽约公开的法庭文件，美国正试图查封位于曼哈顿的一处豪华公寓，据称该公寓是用刚果政府掠夺的资金为该国长期总统德尼-萨苏-恩格索的女儿购买的。【原文：The US is trying to seize a luxury apartment in Manhattan allegedly bought with money looted from the government of Congo for the daughter of that country’s longtime President Denis Sassou Nguesso, according to court papers made public in New York Monday.】

item.title: T.罗尔-普莱斯在代理权争夺战中支持迪斯尼董事会
item.description: 随着激烈的代理权争夺战接近尾声，华特迪士尼公司赢得了资产管理公司 T. Rowe Price 的支持。【原文：Walt Disney Co. has won the support of asset manager T. Rowe Price as its heated proxy battle approaches the finale.】

item.title: Calvin Klein 所有者 PVH 因警告欧洲经济疲软而暴跌 20
item.description: PVH 公司发布的全年销售指导低于预期，该公司股价在尾盘暴跌 20%。【原文：PVH Corp. shares plunged 20% in late trading after the company gave full-year sales guidance that fell short of expectations.】

item.title: 麦肯锡为部分离职员工提供九个月工资
item.description: 麦肯锡公司（McKinsey & Co：拿着九个月的工资走人。【原文：McKinsey & Co. has made a unique offer to some of its staff: Take nine months’ pay and go away.】

item.title: Ares 以 "土地价值 "出售 1.13 亿美元的丹佛办公楼抵押贷款
item.description: 房地产投资管理公司 Cress Capital 表示，该公司以相当于土地成本的价格从 Ares Management Corp.【原文：Cress Capital, a real estate investment manager, said it acquired a $113 million mortgage on a Denver office tower from an Ares Management Corp. affiliate for the equivalent of the land cost.】

item.title: Citadel的肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）认为经济增长 "温和"，对美国债务发出警告
item.description: Citadel 公司创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）告诉投资者，他预计未来几个季度经济将温和增长，并称美国国债是一个 "不容忽视的日益严重的问题"。【原文：Citadel founder Ken Griffin told investors he expects modest economic growth in upcoming quarters and cited US national debt as a “growing concern that cannot be overlooked.”】

item.title: 老虎环球风险投资基金以低于目标 63% 的价格完成 22 亿美元的投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，老虎环球管理公司（Tiger Global Management）为其最新的风险投资基金募集了约 22 亿美元，远低于 60 亿美元的目标，也是近十年来募集资金最少的一次。【原文：Tiger Global Management gathered about $2.2 billion for its latest venture-capital fund, well short of a $6 billion target and its smallest fundraising haul in roughly a decade, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷驳回对冲基金关于国内生产总值挂钩证券的诉讼
item.description: 阿根廷胜诉，驳回了奥勒留资本管理公司和其他对冲基金要求支付与南美国家经济表现挂钩的证券的诉讼。【原文：Argentina won the dismissal of lawsuits by Aurelius Capital Management and other hedge funds seeking payment on securities tied to the performance of the South American nation’s economy.】

item.title: 墨西哥将停止部分石油出口，进一步挤压全球市场
item.description: 墨西哥国家控制的石油公司计划在未来几个月内停止部分原油出口，此举将减少日益紧缩的全球市场供应。【原文：Mexico’s state-controlled oil company plans to halt some crude exports over the next few months, a move that would cut supply from a tightening global market.】

item.title: 纽约和旧金山能否摆脱城市厄运循环？
item.description:
空置的办公楼会怎样？【原文：

What happens to all the empty office buildings?

】
